name: Autumn's Fairies
description:
• A cute and relaxing 3D plateformer

/!\ Graphics, logos and 3D models are not the finals versions, this is just a gameplay test for collect players opinions and advices. The devlog will be frequently updated. Don't hesitate to leave your opinions on the Gamejolt page. /!\

Carino is a little Semi, small living seeds, who live in the Seed Wood with his friends and family, living in harmony with fairies, small winged creatures with multiple powers. One day, a terrifying dark force kidnap them for his dark intention. Our courageous Carino decide to go on an adventure for saving his friends and family through the world !

Autumn's Fairies is a 3D Plateformer where you have to collect coins and fairies for moving forward into the game... This is a game with strong inspiration of the classic of this game kind like : "Super Mario 64" & "Super Mario Galaxy", "Banjo-Kazooie", "Crash Bandicoot", ect...

With cute world, joyful and rhythmic music, and lovely characters : Autumn's Fairies is a love letter to all the 3D plateformer, retro as well as modern.

itch.io : https://woooden-games.itch.io/autumns-fairies
Gamejolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/autumn-s-fairies/604215
